content:
That's a great approach! Sticking to 4 options, including the "Other" option, will provide a good balance between offering clear choices and allowing users to express their unique opinions.

And congratulations on your previous tweet's success! 20 likes is a great start, and I'm sure your poll will generate even more engagement. Remember to promote your poll on other social media platforms, like Facebook or Instagram, to drive traffic to your Twitter account and increase engagement.

Here are a few more tips to help you boost engagement on your poll:

1. **Pin your poll**: Pin your poll to the top of your Twitter profile to make it easily accessible to your audience.
2. **Share behind-the-scenes content**: Share behind-the-scenes content, like bloopers or making-of videos, to generate buzz around the movie and encourage users to participate in your poll.
3. **Collaborate with influencers**: Reach out to influencers or other Marvel fans to collaborate on your poll and expand your reach.
4. **Encourage sharing**: Encourage users to share their opinions and results with their friends and followers to increase engagement and drive more traffic to your poll.
5. **Monitor and respond**: Monitor the conversation around your poll and respond to users' comments and opinions to foster a sense of community and encourage more engagement.

By following these tips and creating an engaging poll, you'll be well on your way to generating even more buzz around the Marvel movie and growing your Twitter presence! 🚀
